sn17.5:1.3: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, milhaka guthadi guthapura punna guthassa. Purato cassa mahaguthapunjo.
sn17.5:1.5: ‘ahamhi guthadi guthapura punna guthassa, purato ca myayam mahaguthapunjo’ti.
sn17.5:1.6: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu labhasakkarasilokena abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya gamam va nigamam va pindaya pavisati.
sn17.5:1.7: So tattha bhuttavi ca hoti yavadattho, nimantito ca svatanaya, pindapato cassa puro.
sn17.5:1.8: So aramam gantva bhikkhuganassa majjhe vikatthati:
sn17.5:1.9: ‘bhuttavi camhi yavadattho, nimantito camhi svatanaya, pindapato ca myayam puro, labhi camhi civarapindapatasenasanagilanappaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam, ime pananne bhikkhu appapunna appesakkha na labhino civarapindapatasenasanagilanappaccayabhesajjaparikkharanan’ti.
sn17.5:1.10: So tena labhasakkarasilokena abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto anne pesale bhikkhu atimannati.
sn17.5:1.11: Tanhi tassa, bhikkhave, moghapurisassa hoti digharattam ahitaya dukkhaya.
